subject: Communication
title: Third Culture Building
description: A quick, practical guide to Third Culture Building.

hook.text: When a German and a Brazilian work together, the answer isn't 'do it the German way' or 'do it the Brazilian way.

buildup.text: Third Culture Building creates a shared set of norms that borrows from all parties' cultures but belongs to none.

discovery.text: Research shows third cultures emerge naturally in long-term international partnerships â€” teams create their own.

twist.text: The process requires explicit negotiation: 'How will we handle deadlines? How will we give feedback?

climax.text: Third cultures work because nobody has to abandon their identity.

punchline.text: The best cross-cultural teams don't pick a culture. They build one.

quiz.question: What is Third Culture Building?
options: Creating shared norms that borrow from all parties' cultures
